item.title: 99Q - Raphael Chestang
item.description: Raphael Chestang (writer, actor, comedian, Dropout) moves his pawn to d4, knight to f6, and moves a ninety-nine question interview to top of mind! Join Raphael and I as we discuss his aspirations for acting, how he got into comedy, capybaras, wedding planning, Adam West Batman, Kid Cudi, play cousins, calculus, Speed, & breakfast at night... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/b8da314/podcast/rss

item.title: The Path to Awakening: Meditation, Zen, and Becoming a Person of No Rank (#73)
item.description:
Prefer YouTube? â€” watch the episode here

Exploring the intersection of ancient wisdom and modern life, Kevin Rose sits down with celebrated Zen teacher Henry Shukman to explore the depths of meditation practice, the nature of awakening, and the universal human capacity for transformation... Feed: https://api.substack.com/feed/podcast/2776405.rss
